languages.text: {n}Имя Ксавьера Калькасара вам, конечно же, знакомо. Но о свершениях и победах человека, являющегося фактическим комендантом Простора, вам неизвестно ничего. Архивы и хроники становятся удивительно немы в тот момент, когда в ситуацию вмешивается Лорд-инквизитор.{/n}

{n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Имя Ксавьера Калькасара вам, конечно же, знакомо. Но о свершениях и победах человека, являющегося фактическим комендантом Простора, вам неизвестно ничего. Архивы и хроники становятся удивительно немы в тот момент, когда в ситуацию вмешивается Лорд-инквизитор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Koronus. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

{n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Koronus. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

{n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Koronus. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

{n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

languages.text: {n}もちろん、ザビエル・カルカサルという名には聞き覚えがある。しかしこの男がエクスパンスの事実上のワーデンとして挙げた業績や勝利については何も知らない。公文書と年代記は、ロード・インクィジターが関与する事案になると驚くほど何も残らない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}もちろん、ザビエル・カルカサルという名には聞き覚えがある。しかしこの男がエクスパンスの事実上のワーデンとして挙げた業績や勝利については何も知らない。公文書と年代記は、ロード・インクィジターが関与する事案になると驚くほど何も残らない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎，这个名字对你而言如雷贯耳。然而，科罗努斯扩区这位实际的掌权者究竟有过怎样的功勋，你对此一无所知。所有档案与记录在提及这位大审判官时，都讳莫如深。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}希维尔·卡尔卡扎，这个名字对你而言如雷贯耳。然而，科罗努斯扩区这位实际的掌权者究竟有过怎样的功勋，你对此一无所知。所有档案与记录在提及这位审判长时，都讳莫如深。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Naturalmente, has oído el nombre de Xavier Calcazar. Sin embargo, no sabes nada sobre las hazañas y las victorias de este protector de la Extensión. En cuanto el Lord Inquisidor se ve involucrado, los archivos y las crónicas guardan un sorprendente silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Naturalmente, has oído el nombre de Xavier Calcazar. Sin embargo, no sabes nada sobre las hazañas y las victorias de este protector de la Extensión. En cuanto el Lord Inquisidor se ve involucrado, los archivos y las crónicas guardan un sorprendente silencio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le nom de Xavier Calcazar ne vous est pas inconnu, bien sûr, mais vous ignorez tout des hauts faits de cet homme qui est de facto le gardien des Étendues. Étrangement, les archives et les chroniques semblent n'avoir plus rien à raconter après l'intervention du seigneur inquisiteur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le nom de Xavier Calcazar ne vous est pas inconnu, bien sûr, mais vous ignorez tout des hauts faits de cet homme qui est de facto le gardien des Étendues. Étrangement, les archives et les chroniques semblent n'avoir plus rien à raconter après l'intervention du seigneur inquisiteur.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast den Namen Xavier Calcazar natürlich schon gehört. Aber du weißt nichts über die Erfolge und Siege dieses Mannes, der de facto der Wächter der Ausdehnung ist. Archive und Chroniken sind überraschend wenig ergiebig, sobald es um den Großinquisitor geht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast den Namen Xavier Calcazar natürlich schon gehört. Aber du weißt nichts über die Erfolge und Siege dieses Mannes, der de facto der Wächter der Ausdehnung ist. Archive und Chroniken sind überraschend wenig ergiebig, sobald es um den Großinquisitor geht.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Xavier Calcazar ismini duymuş olsan da fiilen Enginlik'in Dizdarı olan bu adamın başarıları ve zaferleri hakkında hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun adı geçmeye başladığı anda arşivler ve tarihçeler, ilginç bir şekilde sessizleşiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You've heard the name Xavier Calcazar, of course. But you know nothing about the accomplishments and victories of this man who is the de facto warden of the Expanse. Archives and chronicles grow surprisingly quiet the moment the Lord Inquisitor becomes involved.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Elbette Xavier Calcazar ismini duymuştun ancak fiilen Enginlik'in koruyucusu olan bu adamın başarıları ve zaferleri hakkında hiçbir şey bilmiyorsun. Lord Engizisyoncu'nun adı geçmeye başladığı anda arşivler ve tarihçeler ilginç şekilde sessizleşmekteler.{/n}
